content.p: Interested other cultures? Language? Film? Literature? Communication? Hear first-hand what our students have to say about studying with the School of Media, Language and Cultures. Chalani Ranwala is a second-year student of International Communication with English Language and Literature. Find out what Chalani has to say about diversity on campus and her favourite course modules. Syeda Minaal Pervaiz is a second-year student studying International Communication Studies. Hear what she has to say about her lecturers and career ambitions. Find out what Ridhwan Rosli has to say about his masters in Cultural Studies.
